author: Special Correspondent
text: A youth who sustained injuries in a road accident died in the hospital on Tuesday. Police said M. Puthuraja (30) of Idaikaal near Tenkasi was travelling in a town bus to a hospital on the South Bypass Road on Monday. Puthuraja tried to alight from the bus even before it stopped. As he lost his balance and fell on the road, another bus trailing this bus hit the youth. After being admitted to the hospital with grievous injuries, he died on Tuesday.
title: Youth killed in accident
